title: A pre-fatigue training strategy to stabilize LiCoO2 at high voltage
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2269-2278
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03884J, Paper
Siyuan Qi, Yujia Guan, Junjun Wang, Rui Xia, Lei Zhang, Jinghao Li, Congli Sun, Qinyou An, Kangning Zhao
A pre-fatigue training on commercial cathodes enabled stable cycling at high voltage through a reconstructed mechanically soft, cation-disorder, coherent interface with excellent lattice pinning effect and oxygen blocking property.
